snippet: Ann Patchett, Cynthia Ozick and Madeline Miller are three of the six finalists for the prize, which is awarded to an English-language novel written by a woman.
abstract: Ann Patchett, Cynthia Ozick and Madeline Miller are three of the six finalists for the prize, which is awarded to an English-language novel written by a woman.

headline.print_headline: Three Americans On Orange Prize Shortlist
